The Power of P2P

Today, online privacy and security are badly compormised. Peer-to-Peer models empower communities with equality, sovereignity and resiliency.

PRIVATE

Benefit from 100% data ownership. Define and revoke access rights. No one else can access your information, not even ThreeFold.

SECURE

Run and sotre your applications and workloads independently, without any intermediatires, on an ultra-secure network.

SUSTAINABLE

The ThreeFold Grid enables super-efficient end-to-end data transmission, with up-to 99% energy-savings.

WHY P2P

Give the Gift of Empowerment

Made Possible by the ThreeFold Grid

The ThreeFold Grid is a an globally-distributed network of storage and compute capacity which brings a smart, secure and efficent solution that allows anyone to connect capacity and participate in the internet economy. It is what allows your data and workloads to live freely, privately and securely.
